path.description: A JSON Pointer path pointing to the location to move/copy from.

value.description: Value can be any JSON value

first.description: Indicates whether current page is the first page.

hasNext.description: Indicates whether current page has previous page.

hasPrevious.description: Indicates whether current page has previous page.

last.description: Indicates whether current page is the last page.

page.description: Page number, starts from 1. If not set or equal to 0, it means no pagination.

size.description: Size of each page. If not set or equal to 0, it means no pagination.

ownerName.description: Name of User who uploads the attachment

size.description: Size of attachment. Unit is Byte

permalink.description:
Permalink of attachment.
If it is in local storage, the public URL will be set.
If it is in s3 storage, the Object URL will be set.

hideFromList.description:
Whether to hide the category from the category list.

When set to true, the category including its subcategories and related posts will not be displayed in the category list, but it can still be accessed by permalink.

Limitation: It only takes effect on the theme-side categorized list and it only allows to be set to true on the first level(root node) of categories.

postTemplate.description:
Used to specify the template for the posts associated with the category.

The priority is not as high as that of the post.

If the post also specifies a template, the post's template will prevail.

preventParentPostCascadeQuery.description:
if a category is queried for related posts, the default behavior is to query all posts under the category including its subcategories, but if this field is set to true, cascade query behavior will be terminated here.

For example, if a category has subcategories A and B, and A has subcategories C and D and C marked this field as true, when querying posts under A category,all posts under A and B will be queried, but C and D will not be queried.

postCount.description: 包括当前和其下所有层级的文章数量 (depth=max).

visiblePostCount.description: 包括当前和其下所有层级的已发布且公开的文章数量 (depth=max).

availablePaymentMethods.description: 当前销售渠道可用的支付方式列表（不包含敏感配置）.

lastTransitionTime.description: Last time the condition transitioned from one status to another.

message.description:
Human-readable message indicating details about last transition.
 This may be an empty string.

reason.description: Unique, one-word, CamelCase reason for the condition's last transition.

status.description: Status is the status of the condition. Can be True, False, Unknown.

type.description:
type of condition in CamelCase or in foo.example.com/CamelCase.
 example: Ready, Initialized.
 maxLength: 316.

Condition.description:
EqualsAndHashCode 排除了lastTransitionTime否则失败时，lastTransitionTime 会被更新
 导致 equals 为 false，一直被加入队列.

page.description: Page number, starts from 1. If not set or equal to 0, it means no pagination.

size.description: Size of each page. If not set or equal to 0, it means no pagination.

generateName.description: The name field will be generated automatically according to the given generateName field

version.description: Current version of the Extension. It will be bumped up every update.

Notification.description:
{@link Notification Notification} is a custom extension that used to store notification information for inner use, it's on-site notification.

Supports the following operations:

  • Marked as read: {@link NotificationSpec#setUnread(boolean) NotificationSpec#setUnread(boolean)}
  • Get the last read time: {@link NotificationSpec#getLastReadAt NotificationSpec#getLastReadAt()}
  • Filter by recipient: {@link NotificationSpec#getRecipient NotificationSpec#getRecipient()}

first.description: Indicates whether current page is the first page.

hasNext.description: Indicates whether current page has previous page.

hasPrevious.description: Indicates whether current page has previous page.

last.description: Indicates whether current page is the last page.

page.description: Page number, starts from 1. If not set or equal to 0, it means no pagination.

size.description: Size of each page. If not set or equal to 0, it means no pagination.

paymentMethodId.description: Payment method ID. Must not be null when first initiating the payment.

returnUrl.description: 支付成功后的返回 URL

PaymentMethodPublicResponse.description: Payment Method Public Response. No sensitive data included.

releaseSnapshot.description: 文章引用到的已发布的内容，用于主题端显示.

name.description: Extension name. This field is mandatory

Ref.description: Extension reference object. The name is mandatory

path.description: A JSON Pointer path pointing to the location to move/copy from.
A JSON Pointer path pointing to the location to move/copy from.

value.description: Value can be any JSON value

rawType.description: such as: markdown | html | json | asciidoc | latex.

imageUrl.description: The image URL associated with this specification option.

value.description: The value of the specification option.

color.description:
Color regex explanation. 
 ^                 # start of the line
 #                 # start with a number sign `#`
 (                 # start of (group 1)
   [a-fA-F0-9]{6}  # support z-f, A-F and 0-9, with a length of 6
   |               # or
   [a-fA-F0-9]{3}  # support z-f, A-F and 0-9, with a length of 3
 )                 # end of (group 1)
 $                 # end of the line

path.description: A JSON Pointer path pointing to the location to move/copy from.

value.description: Value can be any JSON value

file.description: The file to upload. If not provided, the url will be used.

filename.description:
The filename to use when uploading from url. If not provided, the filename will be
 extracted from the url.

url.description: The url to upload from. If not provided, the file will be used.

UploadForm.description:
Upload form from console. The file and url are mutually exclusive. If both are provided,
 the file will be used.

providerUserId.description:
The unique identifier for the user's connection to the OAuth provider.
 for example, the user's GitHub id.

registrationId.description: The name of the OAuth provider (e.g. Google, Facebook, Twitter).

updatedAt.description: The time when the user connection was last updated.

username.description: The {@link Metadata#getName Metadata#getName()} of the user associated with the OAuth connection.
